title: Direct X error
body: Why is it that I have been playing this game since beta and this game still has massive issues.  I try to go into game and it gives me "An unknown error has occurred and league of legends can not start".  I have everything updated. GPU is updated, Direct X updated, Everything on my computer is up to date. Why I am getting this bogus error

replies.body: There might be something critically failing with how your version of League was installed. Let's grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **reinstall and clean uninstall** just in case there are some stray damaged files lying about.

Hey so i just ran the repair tool and its reinstalling now. if this still does not work what else can i do?

i had this problem awhile ago but when i removed something it was fixed but it just came back im assuming because of the new patch.

That's alright, it still helps us to narrow down what the main issue *isn't*. Hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a little more in depth troubleshooting, and make sure to send them the logs that were generated by the Hextech Repair Tool. They'll be able to use those to narrow down what's going wrong.
